Action.UseTTSTextExpression: Kill luminescence and stay close to boss

Trigger.Name: Lunar Cry
Trigger.RegularExpression: Fenrir readies Lunar Cry.

Trigger.Name: Demon Eye (WIP)
Trigger.RegularExpression: The catoblepas readies Demon Eye.

Trigger.Name: Standstill (WIP)
Trigger.RegularExpression: Mumuepo the Beholden casts Standstill.

Trigger.Name: Animadversion
Trigger.RegularExpression: Midgardsormr readies Animadversion.

Trigger.Name: Astraea
Trigger.RegularExpression: 03:[A-F0-9]{8}:Added new combatant Astraea

Trigger.Name: Lock Last Boss
Trigger.RegularExpression: 00:0839:The Forsworn Promise will be sealed off in 15 seconds!

Trigger.Name: Unlock Last Boss
Trigger.RegularExpression: 00:0839:The Forsworn Promise is no longer sealed!

Trigger.Name: Gold Lungs & Burrs (eat fruit at 2 or more stacks)
Kill Second Boss - Use Return
Trigger.RegularExpression: 0839:The Yellow Hall is no longer sealed!

Trigger.Name: Pick up sphere
Trigger.RegularExpression: 00:0839:A (sun|moon|star) sphere (rolls|falls) from

Trigger.Name: Mummy Spawn
Trigger.RegularExpression: 03:[A-F0-9]{8}:Added new combatant Mummy Flamen

Trigger.Name: Corrupted Crystal debuff (go away from party at 3 stacks)

Action.UseTTSTextExpression: go away from party, stacks explode soon

Trigger.Name: Kill spotted egg (not plain)
Trigger.RegularExpression: 00\|[^|]*\|0839\|\|The egg is threatening to hatch\.\|

Action.UseTTSTextExpression: kill glowing egg with dark spots

Trigger.Name: Zu in the air = kill any ads alive
Siren Song (heal target to max HP)
Chyme
Trigger.RegularExpression: 03:[\w]+:Added new combatant Chyme Of The Mountain

Trigger.Name: Mad Dash
Trigger.RegularExpression: 14:(?<cast>(EE1|EE0)):Myath starts using Mad Dash on (?<target>[\w-' ]+)

Trigger.Name: Burning Chains
Trigger.RegularExpression: You suffer the effect of *.Burning Chains.

Trigger.Name: Faith Unmoving
Trigger.RegularExpression: Ser Grinnaux readies Faith Unmoving.

Trigger.Name: Book Glow
Trigger.RegularExpression: The demon tome begins to glow...

Trigger.Name: Void Call
Trigger.RegularExpression: The Everliving Bibliotaph begins casting Void Call.

Trigger.Name: Lava Flow
Trigger.RegularExpression: Gowrow readies Lava Flow.

Trigger.Name: Pick up the key (Eng only)
Trigger.RegularExpression: 00\|[^|]*\|0839\|\|The 8th Order pickman drops a candlekeep key\.\|

Action.UseTTSTextExpression: kill slime ad on top of floor fissure

Trigger.Name: Kill Engines (check if regex matches all the time)
Seduce
Trigger.RegularExpression: 14:1F7A:Ruby Princess starts using Seduce on Ruby Princess

Trigger.RegularExpression: 14:1F82:Shisui Yohi starts using Mad Stare on Shisui Yohi

Trigger.RegularExpression: Otengu casts Wile of the Tengu

Trigger.RegularExpression: 14:476[23]:Lugus starts using Scorching (?<move>Right|Left) on Lugus

Trigger.Name: Mortal Flame
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:[A-F0-9]{8}:(?<player>[a-zA-Z-' ]{1,31}) gains the effect of Mortal Flame from Lugus

Trigger.RegularExpression: 14:4769:Seeker Of Solitude starts using Shadowbolt on (?<player>[a-zA-Z-' ]{3,21})

Trigger.RegularExpression: 14:471B:Leannan Sith starts using Storm Of Color on (?<player>[a-zA-Z-' ]{3,21})

Trigger.RegularExpression: 14:4E26:Unknown starts using Luminous Ray on Unknown

Trigger.RegularExpression: 14:4B57:Kyklops starts using Eye Of The Cyclone on Kyklops

Trigger.Name: Accursed Hoard
Trigger.RegularExpression: You sense the Accursed Hoard calling you\.\.\.

Trigger.Name: Portal Open
Trigger.RegularExpression: 00\|[^|]*\|0839\|\|The (?>Beacon|Cairn) of Passage is activated!

Trigger.Name: Duplicate Pommander
Trigger.RegularExpression: 00\|[^|]*\|0839\|\|You return the pomander of (?<item>[^|]*) to the coffer\. You cannot carry any more of that item\.
